P

Piece - Class in jman
An instance is a piece for use in the J*Man!! assignment 2.
Piece(int, Map) - Constructor for class jman.Piece
Constructor: a Piece on Map m with type t.
pieceAt(int, int) - Method in class jman.Map
= the Piece on tile (x, y) (null if (x, y) is outside the grid or contains null).
Pillar - Class in jman.piece
An instance of this class is a Pillar.
PILLAR - Static variable in class jman.Piece
 
Pillar(int, int, Map) - Constructor for class jman.piece.Pillar
Constructor: a new Block at position (x, y) on Map m with random color.
putNew(int, int, int) - Method in class jman.Map
If (x, y) is in the grid and empty, put a new piece of type typ in location (x, y); and, if the new piece is J*Man, store it in field jMan.
